paint.viewer.panels

Interface RecordingControlsPanel.Listener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordingViewerFrame
    Enclosing class:

    public static interface RecordingControlsPanel.Listener
    Defines callback methods for handling user actions triggered by this panel.
